alert.note: Alert for Hatteras Island; Northern Outer Banks (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 16 at 3:37AM EST until January 16 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT... The Coastal Flood Threat has ended as coastal flooding has not been noted overnight. Given this, the coastal flood advisory has been cancelled. For the High Surf Advisory, large breaking waves of 7 to 10 feet expected in the surf zone. * WHERE...The beaches north of Cape Hatteras. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS... High surf will continue into this morning as long period 7-10 ft seas continue to persist creating hazardous conditions for swimmers and surfers north of Cape Hatteras.
info.instruction: Inexperienced swimmers should remain out of the water due to dangerous surf conditions.
